Tag.description: Creates a key-value pair for a specific resource.

Key.description: The name assigned to the tag that you create.
Key.markdownDescription:
The name assigned to the tag that you create.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.description: Contains one or more values that you assigned to the key name you create.
Value.markdownDescription:
Contains one or more values that you assigned to the key name you create.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
Creates a key-value pair for a specific resource.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

CertificateId.description: A unique identifier for the certificate.
CertificateId.markdownDescription:
A unique identifier for the certificate.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 22  
Maximum Length: 22  
Pattern: ^cert-([0-9a-f]{17})$  
Update requires: No interruption

As2Id.description: AS2 identifier agreed with a trading partner.
As2Id.markdownDescription:
AS2 identifier agreed with a trading partner.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Update requires: No interruption

ProfileType.description: Enum specifying whether the profile is local or associated with a trading partner.
ProfileType.markdownDescription:
Enum specifying whether the profile is local or associated with a trading partner.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: LOCAL | PARTNER  
Update requires: Replacement

Tags.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.
Tags.markdownDescription:
An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

CertificateIds.description: List of the certificate IDs associated with this profile to be used for encryption and signing of AS2 messages.
CertificateIds.markdownDescription:
List of the certificate IDs associated with this profile to be used for encryption and signing of AS2 messages.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

Arn.description: Specifies the unique Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the profile.

Specifies the unique Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the profile.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 20  
Maximum Length: 1600

Update requires: No interruption
